name: Luupp
overview:
Luupp is a website for users to share product deals and share there shopping tips and knowledge.

Luupp is very much a social website with a strong game mechanics enthesis and Facebook and Twitter integration.

Luupp is a new place on the web where you can share shopping tips and amazing deals with other people like you. You can find and share great bargains from your favourite online retailer to your local high street store. It’s a great community and we’d love for you to be a part of it.

Find the best deals, advice and shopping experts.
